messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Set your books free!
messages.msgSnippet: This is very cool Aimee. Thanks for sharing it. I m going to bring some books over to Europe when we go this summer. -- ~Mary
messages.messageBody:
This is very cool Aimee. Thanks for sharing it. I'm going to bring some books over to Europe when we go this summer.

--
~Mary
http://zenmommasgarden.blogspot.com/

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh

-------------- Original message ----------------------
From: "Aimee & Paul Bogush" <shaggyhill@...>
> I just bumped into this website and I'm SO excited to start some books

> Aimee

messages.subject: Set your books free!
messages.msgSnippet: I just bumped into this website and I m SO excited to start some books travelling in the wild.  Enjoy! Aimee http://www.bookcrossing.com/ “It is never too
messages.messageBody:
I just bumped into this website and I'm SO excited to start some books travelling in the wild. Enjoy!

Aimee

http://www.bookcrossing.com/



�It is never too late to be what you might have been.� ~~George Eliot

"unschooler, n : one who learns from life and love and great books
and late morning conversations and big projects and eccentric uncles
and mountains and mistakes and volunteering and starry nights..."
~~From a t-shirt found at: www.lowryhousepublishers.com

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
